definition: you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
to cut/to slice/tangent (math)
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
do not/there is none who
surname Mo
Don't spread abroad the shame of the family, don't believe rumors lightly. (idiom)/Don't wash your dirty linen in public, don't listen to others' gossip.
pinyin: jia1 chou3 bu4 ke3 wai4 chuan2 , liu2 yan2 qie4 mo4 qing1 xin4
containing_words.word: 家丑不可外传，流言切莫轻信

sentences.english: I will not forget God's Word.
Regular adulteress inspection, for all sorts of discomfort don't take it lightly.
sentences.chinese: 定期妇检，对于各种不适切莫掉以轻心。

sentences.english: Do not preach the Lord a sermon in your long prayers.
sentences.chinese: 切莫在你冗长的祷告中向主作一番讲道。

sentences.english: Don't interpret it without real understanding when you study a foreign language.
sentences.chinese: 学习外国语切莫望文生义。

sentences.english: Let us not wallow in the valley of despair.
sentences.chinese: 我们切莫再沉湎于绝望的深谷之中。

sentences.english: Think not that thy word and thine alone must be right.
sentences.chinese: 切莫认为唯有自己才是对的。

sentences.english: Never seem more learned than the people you are with.
sentences.chinese: 切莫表现得比你在一起的人学得更多。

sentences.english: If you cannot bite never shou your teeth.
sentences.chinese: 不会咬人，切莫龇牙咧嘴。

sentences.english: Therefore, we shall compete against time and do not let it slip by unproductively.
sentences.chinese: 因此，必须与时日竞争，切莫使时日空过。

sentences.english: The judge told the man to desist from threatening his wife.
sentences.chinese: 法官告诫那男子切莫再去威胁其妻。

sentences.english: Forget stock markets only going up.
sentences.chinese: 切莫幻想股市只涨不跌。

sentences.english: When faced with a choice, don't betray your loving Leader.
sentences.chinese: 面临抉择时，切莫背弃爱你的主。

sentences.english: Never identify personal opinions with facts.
sentences.chinese: 切莫把个人观点与事实等同起来。

sentences.english: Don't be indecisive on the road of friendship.
Compete with time. Do not let it slip by vacantly .
sentences.chinese: 必须与时日竞争，切莫使时日空过。

sentences.english: LeiZiFeng a stopped monkeys, advised its never impulse.
sentences.chinese: 雷子枫一把拦住猴子，劝其切莫冲动。

definition: by no means
remember at all costs
to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
to save a little only to lose a lot (idiom)
to remember with reverence/to bear in mind/to keep in mind
don't!/must not
in order to avoid/so as not to
to guard against/to beware of
think three times then go (idiom); don't act before you've thought it through carefully
to easily trust/gullible/naïve
cannot/should not/must not
must/to need to/to be sure to
may I offer a bit of advice
to take care/to look out
think again and again before acting (idiom); consider carefully in advance
penny wise and pound foolish (idiom)
